reviews.review: You gotta think with portals, and that's hard, but with friends, it's fun and i remember the sale the Potato Sack sale (IRL since my friend had steam at the time) the game is fun the story is fun 10/10 would stuff her in a Potato again
its good and.... yeah. its good

( ) Regular, não dá para entender tudo
( ) Ótima, você entende tudo e ainda quer mais
(X) Sensacional, tão épica que você queria viver ela na vida real

Arrependimento em comprar?

( ) Sim, pedi reembolso e vomitei no banheiro
( ) Sim, tão bosta que até o lixo se sentiu importante
( ) Não sei
( ) Não, é tão bom que eu até compraria sua continuação

[i]Bugs[/i]?

( ) Jogo em si é um [i]bug[/i]
( ) Sim (segundo as pessoas), mas nunca vi o tal [i]bug[/i]
( ) Sim, atrapalha a jogabilidade do jogador
( ) Sim, porém é só em gráficos
(X) Não, o jogo não tem [i]bugs[/i] (ou eu nunca vi)


Nota final: 10

Considerações finais:

Continuação da franquia [i]Portal[/i], [i]Portal 2[/i] ocorre após os acontecimentos finais de [i]Portal[/i], o jogo possui muito mais enigmas e é muito mais longo que seu antecessor. Assim como seu antecessor, a mecânica é a mesma, porém em alguns enigmas possuem muito mais recursos que os enigmas de [i]Portal[/i]. A história dos dois é sensacional! RECOMENDO VOCÊ CONHECER E JOGAR A FRANQUIA [i]PORTAL[/i]!

Juego Buenardo, es como el 1 pero tiene un 2 en el titulo y es mejor que el 1 ya que te clava mas mecánicas de jugabilidad que me dejaron pensando como un gordo re pelotudo de mierda que se sentia re inutil ya que no se podia pasar un  nivel de un jueguito de mierda pero que juego poronga eh me re tilteo esta waska
Co-op Tercih Ederim, Tek Oyunculu Bayar Bence...
An amazing classic, for sure one of the gratest videogames ever

我 是 傻 逼 
给我恐高症折磨坏了，但确实挺好玩的

I think its is a great game to introduce wasd controls to and I feel like that I have learned some problem solving skills along the way. And its a great game to boot. That expands upon both the gameplay and storyline of the first portal game. I would recommend it to anyone.
Very fun puzzle game with some great jokes thrown in! This game is 100% worth your money!

Very, very fun game. Amazing puzzles, and nice story too. The co-op is just as fun, and while the stage builder is nice too, it could use a little work. I think there are mods that make the course maker better though, and I haven't checked them out yet, so idk. Overall, 9/10, would definitely recommend.
Buy it. The game play is great, and the dialogue is incredibly memorable.
jeg elsket historien jeg elsket karakterene humoren alt om spillet 9/10 det eneste jeg ikke likte var loading screens hele tiden
One of the greatest games ever, nothing more needs to be said!

Ещё один шедевр от VALVe.
Отличный сюжет, круты головоломки, запоминающиеся персонажи.
Рекомендую
If you like puzzle games and a nice story, this is the game for you.
juegazo 10/10 puzzles complicados buena historia y lo mejor los mapas de la comunidad igual de dificiles que en el modo historia ademas de ser un juego barato mucho mejor que portal 1
it is in my opinion, one of the best games made so far because it builded on the 1st game and the gameplay is amazing and the story is amazing. 11/10

The story is amazing and really engaging with amazing gameplay and animations. The soundtrack fits perfectly and is fun to play with mates on the multiplayer. I have played through this game multiple times and it never good old. Not once.
I first played this in my Xbox 360 but it was so good that I had to buy it on pc so I could play it with my friends.
Had an amazing time even on the second run of the game. amazing story and experience.

If you want a challenging puzzle game w/ co-op and replay value, then look no further!

Don't worry about the specs. Runs on potat PCs, just make sure your GPU supports at least Directx version 9.0c. 

No doubt that you'll fall in love with the characters, story and gameplay.

Oh it also has taunts/emotes and hats, so it's good if you like Team Fortress 2 :D

My honest opinion? It combines simple mechanics to create a mind-boggling puzzles, you could spend a solid two hours trying to figure out a room before, eventually, giving up... HOWEVER - should you complete the room, you'll get to experience the most blessed clarity in your life. My IQ increases by 0.02 each time I solve a puzzle.

Co-op amplifies the enjoyment too. And since it's a convenient game that can practically run on any PC, you should be able to co-op this with your grandmother or flat chested goth GF that has never played a game in her life - or just a bud.

[b] What. A. Gem.[/b]
Hát kivittem ötször szóval nekem tetszik

this game is great, it runs fast, the graphics are outstanding, and the story has twists and turns while still providing a brain puzzling gameplay experience. I cannot recommend enough!
Comprei para ter uma experiência melhorada com esse jogo, e devo dizer que sou e vou sempre ser fã dessa saga e quem sabe um dia nós teremos um Portal 3
令人震撼的世界观，难度适中的谜题，有趣的剧情（中文字幕需要在设置手动开启）翻译是机翻的效果很差，懂一些英语就能get笑点

dude its a fucking portal game what do u expect theyre good. storyline is long but enjoyable, and coop is a goldmine.
10/10
双人模式真的十分好玩

Portal serisinin 2. oyununu hala oynamadıysan gözünde o kadar büyütmene gerek yok bulmacalar o kadar zor değil arkaya chill müzik açarsın oyun gider ve ayrıca yüksek grafiklerde oynamalısın. Benim bu oyundaki en sevdiğim olay Half-Life evreni ile aynı evrende geçiyor olmasıdır ki bu da Half-life veya Portal'ın 3. oyununda oyunun yapımcılarının Portal ve Half-Life adındaki oyunların olay örgülerini tek bir oyuna düzenli bir biçimde yerleştirebilecek olma ihtimali beni gerçekten heyecanlandırıyor .  (Böyle bir oyuna böyle bir açıklama yapmam gerekir.)
honestly the best game iv'e played
On ne le présente plus, un classique, des méchaniques intéressantes, de la réflection et un scénario super, a ceux qui n'ont jamais tâté, foncez!
Hab es bereits zum 2. mal durchgespielt. Macht jedes mal Spaß besonders der Multiplayer
太好玩辣！！！双人单人都好玩！！！一开始觉得单人太简单了！后来完全沉浸剧情！！！对我这种胆子小的人来说精彩又刺激！！！
Well, so this one time I saw a potato and I put it on my gun then it said *Ass* and that perfectly summarizes this game in one word.
Get roasted by a lady commenting your every move and oh yeah your parents they're not coming back.

When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back! 
When life gives you Portal 2, hold on to it like your life depends on it, and do NOT make ANY beverage from it.
This is the best game ever it has portals (what shows the other side of the portal)  and has good videos! and testing elemnets ( i dont say it because its then a spoiler). I love the tubes!

非常好玩 晕3D的话慎入 很有趣也锻炼空间想象能力

acertijos, historia, plataforma, ambientacion, musica....todo en este juego es sobresaliente. Recomendable jugar el primer portal antes de su secuela. Si te gustan los juegos de puzzles, este es un imprescindible!

相比起来，最后的解密房间之后的通往boss之路还有boss战的难度确实有点低，基本上不需要怎么思考。
但是仍然是我玩过的最棒的解密类游戏！
可以把我玩出心肌梗塞的游戏
